title: You don’t need Microsoft 365 when this lifetime Office 2024 deal exists
content:
Macworld

If you’re still handing Microsoft $10 every month for the same Word, Excel, and PowerPoint apps you’ve been using all your life, it might be time to stop the subscription spiral. For a limited time, you can score Microsoft Office 2024 Home for a one-time payment of just $129.97 — no monthly fees, no surprise price increases (reg. $149.99).

This version includes Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and OneNote, all in their latest 2024 editions. It’s the perfect setup for anyone who just wants reliable tools on one Mac or PC without the bloat of cloud storage or required online access that they never use anyway.

You’ll still get real-time collaboration, modern AI-powered features, and smart layout tools. And, because this download is tied to your device (not the cloud), you won’t wake up to a completely new Outlook layout that requires you to quickly re-learn the entire app before work. Or, discover that Microsoft is deleting an app altogether — like they are with Publisher… what’s next?

Don’t sleep on this deal. Microsoft Office 2024 Home for Mac or Windows is available for $129.97 (reg. $149.99) for a limited time. No coupon needed.
